code:
# @param {String} source
# @param {String} target
# @param {Character[]} original
# @param {Character[]} changed
# @param {Integer[]} cost
# @return {Integer}
def minimum_cost(source, target, original, changed, cost)
  # Mapping from original character to possible changes and their costs
  change_costs = Hash.new { |h, k| h[k] = {} }
  original.each_with_index do |o, i|
    change_costs[o][changed[i]] = [] unless change_costs[o].key?(changed[i])
    change_costs[o][changed[i]].push(cost[i])
  end

  # Reduce each change option to the least costly option
  change_costs.each do |o, changes|
    changes.each do |c, costs|
      change_costs[o][c] = costs.min
    end
  end

  total_cost = 0
  (0...source.length).each do |i|
    if source[i] == target[i]
      next
    elsif change_costs[source[i]].key?(target[i])
      total_cost += change_costs[source[i]][target[i]]
    else
      return -1 # Impossible to make the change
    end
  end

  total_cost
end
